title: WEATHER APP
description: This weather app gives users the ability to search for the current weather condition of any location of their choice with a 5 day forecast. This project made use of the weather api to get the data for the project.

title: DAILY PLANNER
description: This is a daily planner that allows you add task for every working hour and tracks past, current and future time.

title: CODE QUIZ
description: This app displays quiz questions and gives you a total score after the count down

title: MOVIE HELPER
description: A website where you type in a movie, and it retrieves the films poster, a trailer, and a short synopsis.

title: BUDGET CALCULATOR
description: MoneyPlanner helps you plan your finances. It will track your incomings, such as wages, interest, dividends and more. It will also track your outgoings, such as rent/mortgage payment, energy bills, water, internet, subscriptions etc.
technology: HTML, CSS , BOOTSTRAP, JQUERY, API, REACT, NODE

title: MY JOURNAL
description: This Application helps you keep track of all the beautiful memories you want to keep forever
